column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Haru says : " Katara ? "
#Text=Katara says : " Haru ! "
#Text=Haru says : " What are you doing here ? "
#Text=Katara says : " It 's my fault you were captured .
#Text=" Katara says : " It was the only way to find you .
#Text=" Haru says : " You 've got guts , Katara .
#Text=I 'll give you that .
#Text=Come on .
#Text=There 's someone I want you to meet .
#Text=" Haru says : " Katara .
#Text=This is my father , Tyro .
#Text=Dad .
#Text=This is Katara .
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's an honor to meet you .
#Text=" Tyro says : " Have some dinner , Katara .
#Text=It 's not as bad as it looks .
#Text=It 's still pretty bad though .
#Text=" Prisoner says : " Tyro .
#Text=The prisoners are complaining there are n't enough blankets to go around .
#Text=" Tyro says : " I 'll talk to the guards .
#Text=In the meantime , make sure the elderly are taken care of .
#Text=The rest of us will simply have to hope for warmer weather .
#Text=" Katara says : " If you do n't mind me asking , what 's your escape plan ?
#Text=" Tyro says : " Excuse me ?
#Text=" Katara says : " You know , the plan to get everyone off the rig ?
#Text=What is it ?
#Text=Mutiny , sabotage ?
#Text=" Tyro says : " The plan ?
#Text=The plan is to survive .
#Text=Wait out this war .
#Text=Hope that one day some of us can get back home and forget this ever happened .
#Text=" Katara says : " How can you say that ?
#Text=You sound like you 've already given up !
#Text=" Tyro says : " Katara , I admire your courage .
#Text=And I envy your youth .
#Text=But people 's lives are at stake here .
#Text=The warden is a ruthless man , and he wo n't stand for any rebellion .
#Text=I 'm sorry , but we 're powerless .
#Text=" Katara says : " We 'll see about that .
#Text=" Katara says : " Earthbenders !
#Text=You do n't know me , but I know of you .
#Text=Every child in my Water Tribe village was rocked to sleep with stories of the brave Earth Kingdom , and the courageous earthbenders who guard its borders .
#Text=Some of you may think that the Fire Nation has made you powerless .
#Text=Yes , they have taken away your ability to bend .
#Text=But they ca n't take away your courage .
#Text=And it is your courage they should truly fear !
#Text=Because it runs deeper than any mine you 've been forced to dig , any ocean that keeps you far from home !
#Text=It is the strength of your hearts that make you who you are .
#Text=Hearts that will remain unbroken when all rock and stone has eroded away .
#Text=The time to fight back is now !
#Text=I can tell you the Avatar has returned !
#Text=So remember your courage earthbenders , let us fight for our freedom !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Your twelve hours are up ; where 's Haru ?
#Text=We 've got ta get outta here !
#Text=" Katara says : " I ca n't .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We do n't have much time .
#Text=There are guards everywhere .
#Text=Get on !
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara , what 's wrong ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm not leaving .
#Text=I 'm not giving up on these people .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What do you mean you 're not leaving ?
#Text=" Katara says : " We ca n't abandon these people !
#Text=There has to be a way to help them .
#Text=" Aang says : " Maybe she 's right .
#Text=What do you say , Sokka ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I say you 're both crazy !
#Text=Last chance !
#Text=We need to leave , now !
#Text=" Katara says : " No !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I hate when you get like this .
#Text=Come on , we better hide .
#Text=" Aang says : " Go hide .
#Text=" Captain says : " Look !
#Text=" Warden says : " Tell me exactly what you saw .
#Text=" Captain says : " Well , sir , it looked like a flying bison .
#Text=" Warden says : " What ?
#Text=" Guard says : " It was a giant flying buffalo , sir .
#Text=With an empty saddle .
#Text=" Warden says : " Which was it ?
#Text=A buffalo or a bison ?
#Text=" Captain says : " Uh , I 'm not sure what the difference is , but that 's not really the point , is it , sir ?
#Text=" Warden says : " I 'll decide what the point is , fool !
#Text=" Warden says : " You !
#Text=Wake up the captain .
#Text=Search the entire rig !
#Text=" Guard says : " Uh , sir .
#Text=" Warden says : " What ?
#Text=" Guard says : " That was ... the captain you just threw overboard , so ... " Warden says : " Then wake up someone I have n't thrown overboard and search the rig !
#Text=There 's something going on here and I do n't like it .
#Text="
